course_description: An interdisciplinary, historically grounded introduction to contemporary approaches to American studies scholarship, with emphasis on issues of class, ethnicity, gender, and cross-cultural studies.
prerequisites: ENG_OX 185 or ENG_OX 186 or equivalent transfer/test credit as a prerequisite.
